pullRequest.title: Provide options to enable/disable shutdown and restart server from management console
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Fix wso2/product-ei#5147
Approach
This will read carbon.xml file and enable/disable shutdown and restart server from the management console.
carbon.xml file located at <EI_HOME>/conf must be configured as follows.
 <disableShutdownRestartFromUI> <disableShutdown>true</disableShutdown> <disableRestart>true</disableRestart> </disableShutdownRestartFromUI>

commit.message:
